title: India releases pigeon accused of spying for China
selftext:
I am so sorry for y'all, there are so many issues to be fixed in India and THIS is what they waste resources on ðŸ™„

Also, very LOL.
comments: This is some next level shit.
A good face palm meme would work here

They kept a bird in bird jail for eight months. You canâ€™t make this stuff up.

Poor little guy escaped in Taiwan and flew all the way here to be free, only to be locked in a cage again.
For godsake not another pigeon spy  .. these guys should stop making a meme out of themselves.... Bringing shame to the entire country
To be fair, they're not entirely wrong that pigeons can be used for such a purpose, carrying messages in secret. But accusing the pigeon (if that was they really did) is \*\*\*\*ing moronic.

China: So what did you learn about India?
Pigeon: Gutar gu
